channel.title: Fantasy on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Fantasy on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: November 23 Dmitry Brushray Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks November 2023. I keep painting chaos space marines. This guy has pretty unusual and bright colour scheme. He’s a chaos champion for a warband called the Reproached Hollows, He’s only known as “The Cyclopes” Special thanks to Littlerevy and her miniature reference: https://instagram.com/littlerevy?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA== Roman warrior, short personal work, a painting study In this personal work called “Lady Victory” I was inspired by knights and medieval, fantasy vibes.

item.title: October 23 Dmitry Brushray Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks October 2023. Decided to paint some skeletons One part Sepulchral Guard, one part Son of Velmorn. This time I was inspired by the miniature (Venomcrawler) of this monster and painted the fan art of the creature in its den in Nurgle style. Also a few figure studies I turned into magicians. #brushray #artbrushray #artist #art #painting #artcommissions #buyart #fantasy #warhammer40k #Warhammer40k #WarhammerCommunity #Warhammer #WarhammerArt #Wh40k #40k #chaos #monster #Venomcrawler #nurgle #horusheresy #GeekArt #NerdArt #hobby #grimdark #TabletopGaming #gaming #SciFi #fiction #robotic #horror #spider #venom #fanart #Miniatures #painting

item.title: Druid sherif
item.description: Character for Live action role play. Wolfram is a druid sheriff, whose connection with nature is unbreakable. His bark wood metal armor was crafted by the ancient trees of the forest, and it has become a part of him. As he moves, the armor rustles like the leaves in the wind. He wields a short, thick sword with a sharp edge, forged from the bones of the earth itself. His shield, crafted from the finest wood, is round and engraved with intricate patterns.
